thread.title: WOW! Indian Cinema Magazine Gives 4/5 Stars For Ram Charan's Bruce Lee
thread.title_full: WOW! Indian Cinema Magazine Gives 4/5 Stars For Ram Charan's Bruce Lee

title: WOW! Indian Cinema Magazine Gives 4/5 Stars For Ram Charan's Bruce Lee
text:
Posted by: Pravallika Anjuri Published: Thursday, October 15, 2015, 16:26 [IST] 
Ram Charan 's Bruce Lee has been getting unanimous positive reports from the industry sources, which is in fact making mega fans more excited. 
It is known that Ram Charan's last release Govindudu Andarivadele was just a moderate hit and couldn't really pull off any records on the star's name. 
Apparently, Kiaara Sandhu, who claims to be an Editor at Indian Cinema Magazine, a member of Censor Board in Middle East and also a Film Distributor in Dubai has reviewed Bruce Lee , a day ahead of the release. 
"Indian Cinema Magazine UAE Review #BruceLeeTheFighter. Paisa Vasool Film. Fantastic Action Stunts, Music & #RamCharan Star Power. ☆☆☆☆", she tweeted this morning. 
In the past, Kiaara reviewed Telugu biggies like Baahubali, Srimanthudu and Rudramadevi. However, she had to face the ire of Telugu movie lovers for bashing Baahubali very badly while she caught the attention of Mahesh Babu fans for giving 5/5 stasr for Srimanthudu . 
But we doubt the authenticity of Kiaara reviews since none from the industry acknowledged her till now. Nevertheless, let us hope Bruce Lee matches up to the expectations and Kiaara's talk comes out to be true. Indian Cinema Magazine Gives 4/5 Stars For Bruce Lee 1/6 Indian Cinema Magazine UAE Review #BruceLeeTheFighter . #RamCharan is Back with Bang. He Steals the Show. @Rakulpreet acts very well. ☆☆☆☆ — Kiaara Sandhu (@KiaaraSandhu) October 15, 2015 Kiaara Tweet 
Editor at Indian Cinema Magazine reviews Ram Charan's Bruce Lee. Indian Cinema Magazine Gives 4/5 Stars For Bruce Lee 2/6 — Kiaara Sandhu (@KiaaraSandhu) October 15, 2015 Rating 
Kiaara gives 4/5 stars for Bruce Lee. Indian Cinema Magazine Gives 4/5 Stars For Bruce Lee 3/6 Indian Cinema Magazine UAE Review #Rudhramadevi .A Well Made Film all the Way. #AnushkaShetty @RanaDaggubati @alluarjun Steals the Show. ☆☆☆☆ — Kiaara Sandhu (@KiaaraSandhu) October 8, 2015 Rudramadevi Indian Cinema Magazine Gives 4/5 Stars For Bruce Lee 4/6 Indian Cinema Magazine UAE Review #Srimanthudu . @urstrulyMahesh Steals the Show all the Way. @shrutihaasan acts very well. Go for it. 5*/5* — Kiaara Sandhu (@KiaaraSandhu) August 5, 2015 Srimanthudu 
Well! Isn't that the same words she said for Bruce Lee? Indian Cinema Magazine Gives 4/5 Stars For Bruce Lee 5/6 Don't Waste your Money on Crap & Fake Film #Baahubali & don't try to watch it specially on IMAX. NOT Recommended. 2*/5* — Kiaara Sandhu (@KiaaraSandhu) July 8, 2015 Baahubali
